attributes.additional_details: It’s like living in a dictator country under correction.
attributes.background: This goes completely against my right of choice. We live in a democratic country, nothing should be forced against our choice. Vaccinations should not be mandatory. It being mandatory is against my human rights.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about potential requirements for people to be vaccinated against covid-19, however it's not clear what it is you would like to be able to do without having to be vaccinated.

You could sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841

'Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

'Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

'Do not make flu vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596957
